name: Hardhat Hustle - Early Access
description:
Hardhat Hustle is a local multiplayer competitive party game filled with crazy construction, tons of explosion, and heaps of opportunities to destroy your friends in the race to own the ultimate construction company!

Build, bomb and blast your way to victory across a number of rounds, with (currently) four playable characters, a bunch of power ups, and much more coming soon! 

If you're interested in following the development of Hardhat Hustle, feel free to follow us on Twitter @snailboatstudio and don't forget to check back regularly for new updates!

As Hardhat Hustle is still in development, new characters, maps, game modes and powerups are all being added and the game is still being tweaked and adjusted, so if you encounter any bugs or issues, please let us know through the "Feedback" option on the main menu.

NOTE: HARDHAT HUSTLE REQUIRES TWO GAMEPADS TO PLAY

  • Current version: 0.5
  • Currently supports two players
  • Four playable characters including:  Brick Boy, Mr Cat, Granny Retro, and Graffiti Girl
  • Three powerups: bomb, cement gun, and trampoline
  • Frenzy game mode (more coming soon!)
